Undercut Beef (sliced) ½ kg 

Chili sauce 2 tbsp 

Hoi son Sauce 1 tbsp 

White pepper ½ tsp 

Salt half tsp 

Sugar 1 tbsp 

Water 1 tbsp 

Egg white 1 

Corn flour 2 tbsp heaped 

Oil 2 tbsp 


Ingredients for steak sauce: 

Oil 2 tbsp 

Garlic (chopped) 1 tbsp 

Sweet sauce ½ cups 

Hoi son sauce 2 tbsp 

Oyster sauce 1 tbsp 

Sugar 1 tsp 

Soya sauce 2 tbsp 

Stock 1 cup 

Corn flour 1 tbsp dissolved in water

1. Marinate undercut with chili sauce, hoi son, salt, white pepper, sugar, egg white, corn flour and oil for 1 hour, deep fry undercut for 10 min. 

2. Remove and keep aside. 

Method for sauce: 

1. Heat oil fry garlic, then golden above all the seasoning with stock. 

2. Beef lastly thicken the sauce with corn flour paste, heat sizzler, add 1 tbsp oil. 

3. Then add the beef with sauce serve sizzling hot.
